name: Tab Volume Control
description: Control volume for individual browser tabs from 0% to 500%. I originally created this for my personal use after being tired of looking through shady add-ons with overreaching permissions. Features include multi-tab control, preset volume levels, and special handling for YouTube and other media sites. I hope others find it useful too!
